The Great Tohoku Earthquake

A project for a course at the Knight Center for Journalism in the Americas
knightcenter.utexas.edu/

An earthquake of magnitude of 9.0 occurred March 11, 2011, off the Pacific coast of Japan. The Japan Sendai Earthquake was followed by a tsunami. This project visualizes how the earthquake was felt across the crountry using data from Japanese cities with more than 1,000 residents.

Data source: Japan Sendai Earthquake Data Portal
